title: Intellivision video game console
material_description: Video game console with game controllers. Object is display only and not functioning
brief_description: Intellivison video games console unit. Black video game unit with two controllers, featuring silver centered dials and a numerical key-pad, that are connected by black power cords and rest on top of unit in special designed slots
